vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development Subdistrict for LC Light Commercial Subdistrict uses and multifamily, retail, and lodging uses on property zoned an LC Light Commercial Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 193, the Oak Lawn Special Purpose District, on the Southwest of the intersection of Knox Street and Travis Street with frontage along Buena Vista Street to the west and Armstrong Avenue to the south

Recommendation of Staff:  Approval subject to a development plan and conditions.
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval subject to a development plan and conditions.

Z212-125(MP)

Recommendation of CPC:  Approval subject to a development plan and conditions.
